com.easyandroidanimations.library

Class FlipHorizontalToAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easyandroidanimations.library.Animation
      • com.easyandroidanimations.library.FlipHorizontalToAnimation

  • public class FlipHorizontalToAnimation
extends Animation
    This animation causes the view to flip horizontally to reveal another user-provided view at the back of the original view. On animation end, the original view is restored to its original state and is set to View.INVISIBLE.
    Author:
    SiYao

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlipHorizontalToAnimation

        public FlipHorizontalToAnimation(View view)
        This animation causes the view to flip horizontally to reveal another user-provided view at the back of the original view. On animation end, the original view is restored to its original state and is set to View.INVISIBLE.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to be animated.
